item.title: [unf] Clare D'Loon, Joy Sculptor
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Performer

When Clare D'Loon, Joy Sculptor enters the battlefield, for the rest of the game, tokens you own become cards that are still tokens. (They continue to exist after they leave the battlefield.)

{1}{W}{U}, {T}: You may put a token from your graveyard or hand onto the battlefield.

https://twitter.com/LelandPalmerMTG/status/1572948915888230402

item.title: [unf] Solaflora, Intergalactic Icon
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Guest

Auras and Equipment you control attached to Solaflora, Intergalactic Icon affect other creatures you control as though those Auras and Equipment were attached to them.

Counters and stickers on Solaflora affect other creatures you control as though those counters and stickers were on them.

https://twitter.com/LelandPalmerMTG/status/1572948915888230402

item.title: [unf] Solaflora, Intergalactic Icon
item.description:

Auras and Equipment you control attached to Solaflora, Intergalactic Icon affect other creatures you control as though those Auras and Equipment were attached to them.

Counters and stickers on Solaflora affect other creatures you control as though those counters and stickers were on them.

https://twitter.com/LelandPalmerMTG/status/1572948915888230402

item.title: [unf] Octo Opus
item.description:
Enchantment

When Octo Opus enters the battlefield, createa 4/4 blue Octopus Performer token named Contortionist with "At the beginning of your upkeep, you may fold this token in half." (It becomes 2/2, then 1/1, ½/½, and so on.)

Sacrifice Octo Opus: Draw a card and an additional card for each of Controtionist's folds.

https://www.instagram.com/p/Ci0Hoxhj3Vm/

item.title: [unf] Katerina of Myra's Marvels
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Performer

As Katerina of Myra's Marvels enters the battlefield, choose a letter.

Whenever you cast a spell whose name begins with the chosen letter, createa white 2/2 Cat creature token with flying.

Partner (You can have two comanders if they both have partner.)

https://twitter.com/coL_Amazonian/status/1572988115970555905

item.title: [unf] Katerina of Myra's Marvels
item.description:

item.title: [unf] Exit Through the Gift Shop
item.description:
Sorcery

Yell "Who wants a souvenir?" and announce the name of a nonland card in your graveyard. Each player in an Un-game who can hear you may bid life. You start the bidding at 0. The high bidder loses life equal to the high bid. They copy the card and may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. If you didn't win the bid, you gain life equal to the high bid and create that many treasure tokens.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3h4jofTP1uw

item.title: [unf] The Most Dangerous Gamer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Gamer Guest

Deathtouch

Whenever The Most Dangerous Gamer enters the battlefield or attacks, open an Attraction.

Whenever you open an Attraction, put a +1/+1 counter on The Most Dangerous Gamer.

Whenever you claim the przie of an Attraction, destroy target permanent.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-preview/most-dangerous-gamer-2022-09-22

item.title: [unf] Squirrel Stack
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — You have five seconds to stack dice on top of one another. If you stack at least five dice, claim the prize.

Prize — Create a 1/1 green Squirrle creature token for each die you stack above the fourht, then sacrifice Squirrel Stack and open an Attraction.

item.title: [unf] Tug of War
item.description:
Sorcery

Players play a subgame starting at 5 life and with up to three permanent cards with different names from their main-game library on the battlefield. As the subgame ends, the winner chooses one of the cards they put onto the battlefield as the subgame began and puts it onto the battlefield rather than shuffling it into their library.

https://twitter.com/maro254/status/1572973486171394050

item.title: [unf] Spelling Bee
item.description:
Creature — Alien Insect

Flying, deathtouch

Whenever Spelling Bee deals combat damage to a player, that player looks at the top card of their library and chooses a word on that card. You spell that word. If you spell it correctly, draw a card. Otherwise, scry 1.

https://twitter.com/JudgeAcademy/status/1572974477390282753

item.title: [unf] Animate Graveyard
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant your graveyard

Enchanted graveyard is a creature on the battlefield with base power and toughness each equal to the number of cards in it. It has the text boxes of all creature cards in it. It's still a graveyard.

If enchanted graveyard would leave the battlefield, instead exile Animate Graveyard.

https://twitter.com/MtgBigmagic/status/1572873429573054465

item.title: [unf] Discourtesy Clerk
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Employee

When Discourtesy Clerk enters the battlefield, open an Attraction. (Put the top card of your Attraction deck onto the battlefield.)

At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or more Attractions, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

https://www.asiaone.com/digital/magic-the-gathering-unfinity-answer-karen-exclusive-preview-card-wizards-discourtesy-clerk-attraction

item.title: [unf] Cover the Spot
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Drop three cards you own from outside the game one at a time onto the playing area from a height of at least one foot (about 0.3 meters). If those cards completely cover Cover the Spot, claim the prize!

Prize — You get {TIX}{TIX}{TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own. Sacrifice Cover the Spot, then open an Attraction.

item.title: [unf] Merry-Go-Round
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Creatures you control with power 2 or less gain horsemanship until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)

https://twitter.com/Marshall_LR/status/1572866685568446469

item.title: [unf] Gallery of Legends
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card, then choose a legendary creature card name with the same mana value as that card. Create a token that's a copy of the card with the chosen name. That token gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

https://www.gamerbraves.com/harness-the-power-of-attraction-cards-in-mtg-with-gallery-of-legends-for-unfinity/

item.title: [unf] Gallery of Legends
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card, then choose a legendary creature card name with the same mana value as that card. Create a token that's a copy of the card with the chosen name. That token gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [unf] Guess Your Fate
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Look at the bottom of your library, then give a person outside the game a one-word clue not on that card. They guess a word. If their guess appears in that card's name, claim the prize!

Prize — Reveal the card, put it into your hand, then sacrifice Guess Your Fate and open an Attraction.

https://nga.178.com/read.php?tid=33564377&rand=669

item.title: [unf] Phone a Friend
item.description:
Sorcery

Call someone and ask them to choose one. If they don't answer, an opponent choses one. (Don't explain anything else. You choose targets.)

• A — Gain control of target creature you don't control.

• B — Choose target creature you control. Create two tokens that are each copies of it.

• C — Take an extra turn after this one.

• D — Draw seven cards.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mIhFGVpGa5E

item.title: [unf] Drop Tower
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Target creature gains flying until end of turn, or until any player rolls a 1, whichever comes first.

https://www.thegamer.com/magic-the-gathering-mtg-unfinity-unf-preview-reveal-spoiler-drop-tower/

item.title: [unf] Ambassador Blorpityblorpboop
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Alien Advisor Guest

When Ambassador Blorpityblorpboop enters the battlefield, you get {TIX}{TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own.

At the beginning of each combat, you may have Ambassador Blorpityblorpboop's base power and toughness become equal to the total power and toughness of all stickers on permanents you control.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-preview/sticky-unfinity-design-2022-09-21

item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elephant Mouse Performer

Whenever you put an ability sticker on a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

{2}{G}{W}, {T}: You get {TIX}. You may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you control.

item.title: [unf] Scampire
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Employee

When Scampire enters the battlefield, you get {TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a creature card in your graveyard.

{3}{B}: Return target creature card with a sticker on it from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-preview/sticky-unfinity-design-2022-09-21
